about.title1: If you are looking for experience and knowledge, you are in the right place.
about.content1: With more than 10 years of experience in the industry, I worked in advertising agencies and companies for many different brands and areas in LATAM, Australia, Spain and Ireland.
about.content2: With a specialized team of professionals around the world, each project is a new challenge.
about.content3: From startups to big companies, growing each business efficiently, positioning the brand and building customer loyalty are our main goals.
about.content4: I am a passionate professional who gives added value to my work. Shall we start?

services.intro: Do you want to launch your brand,
services.description: Discover every tool and pick the most suitable for your business.
services.serviceDescription1: Writing is not for everyone, simplify your concepts and let your brand speak in a simple way
services.serviceDescription2: Get your projects on the right time with the results that you are looking for.
services.serviceDescription3: It's time to set your goals, times and budget. What is not communicated won't be sold!
services.serviceDescription4: Let's start from the beginning! Who we are, how we look like, who our audience is and how we are going to talk to them.
services.serviceDescription5: If your audiovisual project needs a structure, let's get to work.
services.serviceDescription6: Why would you follow a brand? That is the first question to stand out from the average.
services.serviceDescription7: Technical texts on websites are key to shine on Google. Let the professionals do their magic!
services.serviceDescription8: Turn each click on your online store a new sale. Improve your customer's digital experience from the beginning.

testimonial1.name: Ana
testimonial1.content: It was a pleasure work with Carli. Besides being a great person, she is a great professional. She carried out each challenge with dedication and responsibility, always attentive to the smallest detail. I highlight her creativity and positive energy for work. Her contributions were always accurate and were key to the success of many advertising campaigns.

testimonial2.name: Lucía
testimonial2.content: Working with Carli is a great pleasure. She is a highly creative person who approaches projects with the best attitude, understanding and resolving the client's requests and needs. On a personal level, she is always willing to help and brings the best energy.

testimonial3.name: Facundo
testimonial3.content: Working with Carla means working with someone who loves what she does. Always willing to work as a team, contributing creativity, organization, and commitment, with an energy that is contagious. I hope we can work together again soon!

testimonial4.name: Brenda
testimonial4.content: We worked together and I can assure you that she is a great professional. Responsible, a good teammate, problem solver, and above all, passionate about what she does. That makes it a pleasure to work with her.

contact.title: Contact
contact.call_to_action: Get in touch with me and let's schedule a meeting.
